'''Radiant Spincrystal 105''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Limpide est le sanglot d'eau]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located at the rear side of the [[Fountain of Lucine]], [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Fontaine]].
